CustomField.description: This is a semicolon delimited list of object API names (and optionally the parent API name separated by a comma) that have a custom relationship with an included (standard or originating) object. Example: "Custm_Obj1__c; Custm_Obj2__c, Account"
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field has been deprecated. Use the Related Object list instead. (Values in this field will overwrite the Related Object list.)
CustomField.label: Related Objects (Deprecated)
